definition: round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)
to congregate/to assemble/to mass/to gather together/to amass/to polymerize

sentences.english: North Korea also prohibited reunions between North and South Korean families.
sentences.chinese: 朝鲜作为报复停止了让朝鲜和韩国失散家庭团聚。

sentences.english: Theres a reason people cant wait for Christmas, and it haslittle to do with family reunions.
sentences.chinese: 人们等不及过圣诞节的理由和家人团聚没有任何关系。

sentences.english: Later came the first break in their restored home circle. The Dovecote
sentences.chinese: 不久，他们重新团聚起来的家就发生了第一次突破。

sentences.english: Higuchi reads a quote from an elderly man who returned for the reunion.
sentences.chinese: 樋口读取从一个老人团聚返回的报价。

sentences.english: The Chinese values the happy cheerful atmosphere that the family when spending the New Year reunites very much.
sentences.chinese: 中国人非常看重过年时全家团聚的喜乐气氛。

sentences.english: New Year's Eve is the time for family reunion.
sentences.chinese: 除夕之夜，迟一顿丰富年夜饭，是家人团聚的时候。

sentences.english: Her own parents were later reunited with her in France.
sentences.chinese: 后来，她的亲生父母在法国和她团聚了。

sentences.english: Today, Alex is reunited with his family and lives with them.
sentences.chinese: 亚历克斯今天已与家人团聚，并与他们生活在一起。

sentences.english: A congregation in Vorkuta gathers to celebrate Easter at a midnight Mass.
sentences.chinese: 沃尔库塔会众在午夜弥撒上团聚，庆祝复活节。

sentences.english: Jane has just joined her family in America.
sentences.chinese: 简刚和她的家人在美国团聚。

sentences.english: The Haitian a line of people came to quite, Haitian dad have come here to reunite with sea.
sentences.chinese: 海天一行人终于到了蜀地，海天爹也赶来与海天团聚。

sentences.english: When necessary, a tracing service is established to reunite people and families.
sentences.chinese: 在需要的时候，为人们和家人团聚提供寻亲服务。

sentences.english: Reunions between members of divided families will also resume.
sentences.chinese: 分离家庭成员的团聚活动也将恢复。

sentences.english: All of us must come together for the parents' silver wedding.
sentences.chinese: 全家必须团聚，以庆祝父母的银婚。

sentences.english: There`s no better time for The Little Tigers to reunite than the Year of the Tiger.
sentences.chinese: 虎年，无疑是小虎队团聚的绝佳时间。

sentences.english: People get together with family and have turkey on Christmas Eve .
sentences.chinese: 人们在耶诞夜与家人团聚一起吃火鸡大餐。

definition: to celebrate the Chinese New Year
to celebrate a festival/after the celebrations (i.e. once the festival is over)
to know each other/to recognize/to identify/to acknowledge (an old relationship)
to go home to visit one's family
to see each other/to meet in person
